definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Ensure compliance to Crowne Plaza Keys mandatories and implementation of new standards.
sentences.chinese: 確保編輯皇冠假日主要條款並執行新標準。

sentences.english: Once fastening bolts, each bolt to ensure that the force evenly.
sentences.chinese: 一旦開始緊固螺栓，要確保各個螺栓均勻受力。

sentences.english: Make sure that the room you're studying in is not too cold or too warm.
sentences.chinese: 確保學習的房間不要太冷或太溫暖。

sentences.english: This almost-falling into chaos keeps life proliferating.
sentences.chinese: 這種幾近墜落乃至混沌的運行狀態確保了生命的增殖。

sentences.english: Eachindependent cylinder's press-roller has precision micro-adjuster to guarantee the effect of sueding .
sentences.chinese: 每支獨立汽缸壓布輥精確的微調，能確保磨毛效果。

sentences.english: Globalization will not self-regulate in ways that ensure fair distribution of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 全球化不會自我調節，確保公平分配利益。

sentences.english: To ensure the hotel equipments operation normally and safety.
sentences.chinese: 確保酒店設備安全並正常運轉。

sentences.english: Read your software contracts, and make sure you understand your licensing rights.
sentences.chinese: 仔細閱讀軟件合同，確保你明白了享有的許可權。

sentences.english: The world famous brand electrical control components to ensure long-term trouble-free operation of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 世界名牌電器控制元器件，確保機器長期無故障運行。

sentences.english: You must ensure that messages are redistributed correctly.
sentences.chinese: 您必須確保消息被正確地重新分發。

sentences.english: This ensures that I have the right business entity.
sentences.chinese: 這就確保了我得到了正確的業務實體。
確保各項目包執行賽科標準。

sentences.english: Make sure your message is appropriate for each individual.
sentences.chinese: 確保你寫給每個人的祝福語是合適的。

sentences.english: Before travelling we must ensure the availability of petrol and oil.
sentences.chinese: 旅行前，我們必須確保能夠買到汽油和機油。

sentences.english: The chairs are sheltered to ensure operation under the raining weather.
sentences.chinese: 纜車都設有遮雨棚，以確保在雨天照常運行。

sentences.english: There, check that the clocks are all synchronized.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，確保所有時鐘均已同步。

definition: guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
